name: Retrowave '84 (NEW DEMO)
description:
After years of anticipation, the Retrowave '84 demo is now here, where time can be slowed with a single jump as you unleash devastating firepower on your enemies!

This demo will feature:

- 2 Action-packed levels as well as a tutorial level to get to grips with the gameplay

- 5 hard-hitting weapons that can found through exploring the environments

- Variety in enemies to gun down

- Slowing down time whenever you Jump

- The ability to teleport through solid walls, and hit enemies off guard!

FAQ

Full game release when?

December 2023, exact date TBA.

Is there a Steam Page to wishlist?

Yes, it can be found by clicking Here!

Will the Demo be updated during development?

Yes.

Will there be controller/Gamepad support?

When the full game is out, both it and demo will have controller support added.
